fullText: The revival of Andrew Lloyd Webber and Tim Rice's musical about Eva Perón is competent but lacks the fire and passion that made the original so compelling.
dtliExcerpt: The revival of Andrew Lloyd Webber and Tim Rice's musical about Eva Perón is competent but lacks the fire and passion that made the original so compelling.
bwwExcerpt: Naturally, everybody’s flipping out over the hot new bombshell in town. Usually we mean the actress in the title role, but this time it’s the guy who plays the narrator: Ricky Martin — you may have heard of him? And does he deliver!
